name: Fultineer v. Bertz et al., Appellants

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
parties: Fultineer v. Bertz et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree of the lower court entering summary judgment for appellee is affirmed. Costs on appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John 0. Shirk, with him Barley, Snyder, Cooper & Mueller, John R. Gibbel, and Geisenberger, Zimmerman, Pfannebecker & Gibbel, for appellants.
Robert M. Striekler, with him Markowitz, Kagen & Griffith, for plaintiff appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Fultineer v. Bertz et al., Appellants.
Argued April 25, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
John 0. Shirk, with him Barley, Snyder, Cooper & Mueller, John R. Gibbel, and Geisenberger, Zimmerman, Pfannebecker & Gibbel, for appellants.
Robert M. Striekler, with him Markowitz, Kagen & Griffith, for plaintiff appellee.
January 19, 1973:
